::FireBlade::
FireBlade was caught in the face by the claws of Dinobot. His left 
hand dropped the arm of Dinobot and grabbed his face in pain. He 
realed back abit but not enough to pull the sword from Dinobot. With 
applying abit of presure to the hilt of his sord he shot a giant 
stream of flame from the tip of the sword which was still impaled in 
Dinobot.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@d...> wrote:
> ( Carnage: Thank you for responding.)
> 
> ** Gears strained to lift FireBlade, the transformer seemingly 
heavier then Dinobot had anticipated. However, the factor that its 
life would be terminated none the less was still dominant, and with 
that single thought present in his mind Dinobot raised his free hand, 
the claw extended and ready to slit FireBlades throat and end his 
existence.  Just ready to bring down the blade, something suddenly 
occurred to the transmetal two: the enemy was recovering...and a 
scann reviled, too late, that it was enough to move.  FireBlade 
caught Dinobot's hand, even though the sharpness of his claws would 
dig into it, causing deep gashes. However, if there was surprise in 
him, Dinobot failed to express it.  The sword caught the x-Predacon 
in the stomach and bit in deep, though inner organs and circuitry 
were too heavily armored to be damaged fatally.  Dinobot snarled, 
disgusted that FireBlade had given such damage. Snapping his free 
hand forward, claws extended, he slashed at the enemies face while 
sliding off of the tip of his blade, mech-fluid flowing freely from 
the wound while a little trickled at the side of his mouth.  Such 
damage could be repaired easily, however, finding the opportunity to 
take the time was something else.**
> 
>
